body_html:
When I run bazel help it outputs: [bazel release 0.1.1], which seems to be the correct version required for tensorflow.

When running bazel build -s -j 1 --verbose_failures --spawn_strategy=standalone --genrule_strategy=standalone //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package it outputs the following error: http://pastebin.com/AKC7UADW
body_text:

body: When I run bazel help it outputs: [bazel release 0.1.1], which seems to be the correct version required for tensorflow. When running bazel build -s -j 1 --verbose_failures --spawn_strategy=standalone --genrule_strategy=standalone //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package it outputs the following error: http://pastebin.com/AKC7UADW
